previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. San Jose Earthquakes | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 2, San Jose Earthquakes 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution look for their first win of the 2015 season at home against San Jose.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs. San Jose Earthquakes | March 28, 2015

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: Snow playing big factor already. Not many people at game, yellow ball being used, and a bit of wind can be seen. #NEvSJ #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: Chase Woodruff
timelineItems.text: Anyone who thinks MLS should switch to an August-May schedule should be trapped at #NEvSJ forever, 'Black Mirror'-style

timelineItems.name: BobIrving
timelineItems.text: Chillin with some of my favs... @Jermainejunior #NEREvs http://t.co/5RuGHjdZNn

timelineItems.name: Analiese Duvel
timelineItems.text: #NERevs Fort seats behind the net!!!

timelineItems.name: James Downing
timelineItems.text: How about the fact that this is Heaps' 4th season as #NERevs manager? Time flies. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Kelyn Rowe with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: NOW does everyone understand why MLS doesn't play fall-to-spring? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Innocent Emeghara (San Jose Earthquakes) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Chris Wondolowski.
Attempt blocked. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.

timelineItems.desc: Clarence Goodson (San Jose Earthquakes) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Clarence Goodson receives an early yellow

timelineItems.name: TalkQuakes
timelineItems.text: One thing I would like to see from Bingham today is staying closer to line ... Not leaving open goal ... So far so good #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Clarence Goodson (San Jose Earthquakes).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Dubois
timelineItems.text: Snowing pitchside #nerevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Chris Tierney (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: David Bingham makes a diving save on Tierney's effort

timelineItems.name: UK Quakes Fan
timelineItems.text: It looks like they're playing in England, lovely weather #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: The Birthday Seth
timelineItems.text: Finally back for some #nerevs action http://t.co/jioLW3M1f3

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: First 10 minutes have been all Revolution. #SJEarthquakes still trying to get comfortable in this game. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Chris Tierney (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Steve Katz
timelineItems.text: Ummm....Lee went down pretty easy there... #NERevs

timelineItems.name: ben snowfley
timelineItems.text: No problem with embellishing an actual foul. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ron Barnett
timelineItems.text: WOW that was a very soft yellow card, holy cow! #SJEarthquakes

timelineItems.name: Red Monster Sports
timelineItems.text: Consistent stream of snow leads to yellow ball #NERevs #NEvSJ http://t.co/9RnigLI9Aw

timelineItems.name: San Jose Earthquakes
timelineItems.text: 13' Yellow card issued to Clarence Goodson. This follows a HUGE sliding tackle from Goodson to deny the Revs a scoring opportunity.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Squizzato
timelineItems.text: Referee in New England going with short sleeves. Bold choice. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marvell Wynne with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Squizzato
timelineItems.text: Man, a few players went with short sleeves too. Don’t people check the pre-game weather forecast? #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Peter Galindo
timelineItems.text: #NERevs have had some good chances, but, once again, cannot finish. Lee Nguyen causing fits for the Quakes defence.

timelineItems.name: Timm McIntosh
timelineItems.text: I feel like once the #NERevs score, it’ll open the flood gates. I mean, it has to.

timelineItems.name: Stephan
timelineItems.text: Wondo and Will Forte: Separated at birth? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: étienne rädler
timelineItems.text: Better from #Quakes74 at least putting a little work in in the New England end #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Marvell Wynne (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Feel like Farrell is getting more settled at CB. Played well last week and has looked good so far today #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Debbie Lyons
timelineItems.text: Just a little snow #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Eric Beato
timelineItems.text: #NERevs vs. San Jose kickoff. #NEvSJ #MLS http://t.co/zW22HTiMNU

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Early props to Juan Agudelo and Clarence Goodson (SJ). Both in short sleeves and shorts for the match #NERevs #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Yellow ⚽️. #NEvSJ now on MLS LIVE.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).
Shaun Francis (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 1, San Jose Earthquakes 0. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Kelyn Rowe's deflected shot gives New England the lead

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New England Revolution 2, San Jose Earthquakes 1.

timelineItems.name: Brian Little
timelineItems.text: FIRST WIN OF THE SEASON! #NEREVS #DEMREVS #CAPSLOCKMODE

timelineItems.name: Phil Leyva
timelineItems.text: Bingham may have been unconscious for a moment, but Pierazzi has been unconscious all game. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Frank Pimentel
timelineItems.text: Bobby Shuttleworth literally just saved the game. #NERevs get 1st win, 2-1. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Really fantastic halftime adjustments from Kinnear, but the Revs deserved that win for how thoroughly they dominated the first 45.

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution grab their first win of the 2015 season at home against San Jose.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs. San Jose Earthquakes | March 28, 2015

timelineItems.name: Eastern Mass & RI Wx
timelineItems.text: A close up of #NERevs-#Quakes74 match at @GilletteStadium showing wind coming from Patriot Place side of stadium http://t.co/qRFqE4NNYq

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Donnell
timelineItems.text: Gillette Stadium lookin REAL barren right now #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Kelyn Rowe gets @nerevolution on the board for the first time in 2015. Deflection. 1-0. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Sean Sweeney
timelineItems.text: Kelyn Rowe with a massive blast from 17 yards away, caromed off the head of the SJ defender and into the net. 1-nil to the #NERevs. 21st

timelineItems.name: Nolan
timelineItems.text: And #NERevs have their 1st goal of season 4 games in thanks to a deflection. Started with Francis turning over ball. #SJEarthquakes

timelineItems.comment: Matías Pérez García (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Great work from @daigokobayashi_ to force a turnover in a dangerous spot. Fed @LeeNguyen24, who dished to @Krowe210 for a deflected finish.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Callanta
timelineItems.text: Ok can we now stop playing around in the back 3rd and turning the ball over… #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Remember that time I said Rowe would play well during pregame? #NERevs RT @Matt_LaPan: Call it a hunch, I expect a good game from Kelyn Rowe

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Rowe having a fantastic game, lucky deflection, but now the goal has finally come. #NERevs #Quakes74 #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Chris Tierney (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: Jeff Zeserson
timelineItems.text: Snow/rain on this turf certainly does not make for an aesthetically pleasing game. #NEvSJ #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Nathan Vance
timelineItems.text: #NEvSJ playing in an empty NFL stadium in a snowstorm. Very #MLS v1.0. Need soccer-appropriate stadiums with climate-appropriate features

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left.

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #NEvSJ #NERevs Good thing nobody is seeing this game. Terrible representation for the league.

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: #SJEarthquakes are really missing Fatai Alashe in the midfield right now. #Quakes74 #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: If this game represents Jean-Baptiste Pierazzi's chance to reclaim his spot from absent Fatai Alashe ... it's not going that well so far.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Remember when @JuanAgudelo said the #NERevs needed to shoot from distance, because maybe they'd get a deflection? He was on to something.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Daigo Kobayashi.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Rowe tries again from distance. This time right at Bingham. Like how aggressive Rowe is playing today #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Em
timelineItems.text: Great day for some soccer❄❄@NERevolution #NERevs http://t.co/5BoGq7gmXG

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Harvey Rañola
timelineItems.text: Sanna Nyassi and Shaun Francis - where #SJEarthquakes possessions go to die. #SJvNE

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Time for some soccer in the snow! #NERevs #NEvSJ http://t.co/kK9aC8RF3D

timelineItems.name: Kev & Cam Show!
timelineItems.text: Slyde is ready for a Revs victory today! Are you?! Revs vs. Quakes! @NERevolution #NERevs http://t.co/QZbe99qU3i

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: We are underway from snowy @GilletteStadium! #NERevs #NEvSJ http://t.co/C4BtFQqEbC

timelineItems.name: Dylan Curtis
timelineItems.text: Put a Californian in the snow @ChrisEspo110 #nerevs http://t.co/nEYzjbyzL3

timelineItems.name: MSP
timelineItems.text: If we don't score a goal with this lineup...we just aren't very good. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: My #littlelanders love the #nerevs 'cause they're #NETID #nerevsselfie #mls

timelineItems.name: Pieter N van Cort
timelineItems.text: #NERevs go revs, awesome view from the second row today! In the snow! http://t.co/5BoFV6ejF5

timelineItems.name: Eli Stuart
timelineItems.text: Could really use @jordanstewart3 & @FataiPrince27 for this one. However, NERevs really know how to use the cold fake field. #COYQ #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Matías Pérez García (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by José Gonçalves (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: Quakes can only hope the wind holds for the second half. Right now they're bouncing off the ropes, waiting for a chance to regroup.

timelineItems.name: explosion of soccer
timelineItems.text: Can't wait until Innocent is in the league long enough to stop hearing commentators talk about the pronunciation of his name #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Matías Pérez García (San Jose Earthquakes) left footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Squizzato
timelineItems.text: So Daigo, whom we call Kobayashi, has Daigo on his jersey. Emeghara, whom we call Innocent, has Emeghara on his. Cool. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Eli Stuart
timelineItems.text: At what temperature does the vanishing spray turn to visible ice? #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Dom
timelineItems.text: Time for Shea to come in. This is getting silly #Quakes74

timelineItems.desc: David Bingham (San Jose Earthquakes) clears in front of his goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: David Bingham makes a crucial clearance

timelineItems.name: Vignesh Venkat
timelineItems.text: Why isn't Shea playing? #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Quakes are winning the possession battle. But look at how few of those are attacking passes compared to NE: http://t.co/GYDCFogfVs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Emeghara is getting absolutely pummeled. Holding the ball well, but no calls. #Quakes74 #MLS #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: Rowe nearly scores with his belly! #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Keylor Halbur
timelineItems.text: "@mls should play on Europe's calendar!" -An idiot who has never been north of Raleigh in March #NERevs #Quakes74

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 2, San Jose Earthquakes 0. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) left footed shot from very close range.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Kelyn Rowe grabs his second from close range

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) header from very close range misses to the left. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a cross following a set piece situation.
Hand ball by Sanna Nyassi (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: AGAIN! @Krowe210 bags his second of the game and the #NERevs lead 2-0! http://t.co/O374wbBxpq

timelineItems.name: UK Quakes Fan
timelineItems.text: Need to get to half time and re group #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: Pretty sure Innocent Emeghara is thinking to himself, "This kind of weather is why I left Switzerland, no?"

timelineItems.name: Kerry
timelineItems.text: See, get rid of the man-bun and you score two goals just like that. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Marc Sanches
timelineItems.text: See what happens when the man bun disappears? #NERevs #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Gracias a la nieve, NATIVO se viste de amarillo en Foxborough: http://t.co/d2MnAVKzMY #NEvSJ http://t.co/I3KUQHzh37

timelineItems.name: rob c
timelineItems.text: yellow lines, yellow ball, put the latter in the net, #nerevs.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Marvell Wynne.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Marvell Wynne.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: @Krowe210 Rowe has ditched the #ManBun and has now stolen @LeeNguyen24's 2014 headband... #NERevs #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Midnight Riders
timelineItems.text: There's no goal like a snow goal!#nerevs

timelineItems.name: UK Quakes Fan
timelineItems.text: I still believe we're in this but man, we desperately need a goal before half time #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: I really want to see Chris Tierney lead MLS in scoring chances created this year. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).
Innocent Emeghara (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Johnny Pecina
timelineItems.text: Ick. I was hoping the Quakes were going to keep the Revolution winless. But, hey, #NeverSayDie

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Gillette + Snow + Kelyn = Magic #nerevs @kelynrowe

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | Arsenal
timelineItems.text: ROWE. #manbuncurselifted #nerevs http://t.co/cDQs5jCk9a

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: There's the second goal! KelynRowe puts home another to make it 2-0, #NERevs! https://t.co/zqzrzPy9OB

timelineItems.name: Jim O'Leary
timelineItems.text: "The West is so much better than the East". #NERevs 2 - 0 #Quakes74 #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Eric Mozynski
timelineItems.text: Good day for a soccer game...ignore the empty stadium. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: The second brace of @Krowe21's career began with this deflected shot: http://t.co/q1Q1FTzSV3 #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  San Jose Earthquakes. Conceded by Daigo Kobayashi.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: The second brace of @krowe210's career began with this deflected shot: http://t.co/ltXdzUGTNB #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Neither Davies or Agudelo have scored, but having them on same field takes a lot of pressure & defensive attention off #NERevs flankers.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Two goals and now were seeing the confident Revs. Playing with more control and more confidence than they have all season right now #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: The Fort breaks out a chant for Bobby Shuttleworth after catching a harmless pass cause he hasn't had much to do today... #NERevs #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Far Post FC
timelineItems.text: Bad weather in New England but seriously? Come on #NERevs fans. Represent. Empty seats don't look good on tv. B

timelineItems.name: Scott Sneddon
timelineItems.text: I'll take the snow every week if we are winning.. #NERevs http://t.co/RzwrIormy9

timelineItems.name: BringOnTheCOYS
timelineItems.text: These players don't have a clue on what to do, incomplete pass after incomplete pass. #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
First Half ends, New England Revolution 2, San Jose Earthquakes 0.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: That’s the kind of half you want from the Revs. Two Rowe goals and they head into the half up 2-0 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #NEvSJ #NERevs Jim,Revs finally score on a Western team that hasn't shut anyone out yet and you want to compare Conference records?

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @JuanAgudelo dancing on the sideline. #NEvSJ #NERevs http://t.co/hasorXCaCO

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Sign prime Ronnie Ekelund & Jimmy Conrad. RT @MLSfantasyFreak What do you think SJ needs to do in the 2nd half?

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: Very interesting to see what Kinnear decides to do for the 2nd half. #Quakes74 #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @Krowe210 pounces on @SJEarthquakes for his second of the match: http://t.co/F5ShB3oib8 #NEvSJ #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New England Revolution 2, San Jose Earthquakes 0.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Charlie Davies' shot is saved after a great run

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: Would rather be nervous about holding a lead rather than frustrated at not scoring. That said, let's get a couple more if we can! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: The Nitz
timelineItems.text: Are they really playing Africa by Toto at Foxboro? I take back every mean thing I ever said about @NERevolution #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Adam Jahn (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by José Gonçalves (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: OK, seriously? Gillette Stadium scoreboard is advertising iced coffee. #DidYouMissTheWeatherReport?

timelineItems.name: Clifford Beshers
timelineItems.text: Kelyn Rowe is the anti-Sampson. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Robert Jonas
timelineItems.text: Koval said earlier this week that the #SJEarthquakes needed to be more aggressive. They were not in the first half. http://t.co/c7xPyMTolt

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #NEvSJ #NERevs Looks like Kinnear has seen enough of Nyassi and Koval. SJ may not shut an opponent out all year.

timelineItems.name: ben snowfley
timelineItems.text: Wait that shot from Agudelo, inside the 18, went out for a throw in?? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) header from the right side of the six yard box misses to the right. Assisted by Daigo Kobayashi with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Kyle Burkholder
timelineItems.text: Nothing like @MLS having to break out the snow-game ball!! #NEvSJ http://t.co/482BtmpuDk

timelineItems.name: Kyle J. Silva
timelineItems.text: The snow has kept a lot of people at home. #NERevs #Quakes74 #NEvSJ http://t.co/90QXgXqqSY

timelineItems.name: Nolan
timelineItems.text: Don't like that we burned 2 subs to start 2nd half. #SJEarthquakes

timelineItems.name: Eli Stuart
timelineItems.text: At least @SJEarthquakes have the wind at our backs for the 2nd half. So we got that going for us. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Charlie Davies been really impressive with his runs down the channels today. Hasn’t also got the ball but keeps making the runs #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: Chances have been few and far between, but this also has not been MPG's best game, in terms of set-piece deliveries.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Farrell got laid out after playing ball forward. Still shaking effects of it off. Shuttleworth screaming for a foul the whole play #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian Calhoun
timelineItems.text: Wing Agudelo >>>> up top Agudelo #NERevs #analysis

timelineItems.name: ben snowfley
timelineItems.text: Farrell looked like he got elbowed, from his reaction. Can't see an elbow on replay but could be obscured? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Marvell Wynne (San Jose Earthquakes) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: All true. Set pieces also poor. RT @BrianHoovler: can't rely on set pieces. Need to focus on attacking buildup. Passing been poor today

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: A bit better by #SJEarthquakes but have to do better pressuring ball.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Adam Jahn (San Jose Earthquakes).
Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: Quakes will have to pull off Marvell Wynne after apparently suffering a L hamstring injury. Last sub burned with 35+ minutes remaining.

timelineItems.comment: Jean-Baptiste Pierazzi (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Shaun Francis (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: Jeff Carlisle
timelineItems.text: In 1st half, #SJEarthquakes completed just 66.7% of passes out of def third. Hard to build attack that way. Credit NE pressing too. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Quakes Epicenter
timelineItems.text: Wynne has been the most consistent Quake through the first few games. Hopefully it's nothing serious. #Quakes74

timelineItems.desc: Shaun Francis (San Jose Earthquakes) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Shaun Francis is booked for a rough challenge

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: Wynne appears to have injure his hamstring. Cato to come on in. #Quakes74 #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 57' Rowe sends Davies in but Bingham is quick off his line and slides out to collect it. #NERevs #Quakes74 #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: #NERevs doing a great job crowding ball when they lose possession. #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  San Jose Earthquakes. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.
Attempt missed. Clarence Goodson (San Jose Earthquakes) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Matías Pérez García with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Brian Calhoun
timelineItems.text: Once Teal and Jones are back, the Revs are going to be a very deep squad. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: New England Revolution
timelineItems.text: Thanks to Season Ticket Holder Eric Dragsbaek for being today's #NERevs Honorary Captain!

timelineItems.name: The Nitz
timelineItems.text: Looking at Foxboro stands- tough to argue that Miami won't meet the appropriate level of fan support for #MLS #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: San Jose Earthquakes
timelineItems.text: We're underway at Gillette Stadium! LET'S GO QUAKES! #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: San Jose Earthquakes
timelineItems.text: 59' Salinas making his impact felt here in the second half! Continues his overlapping run, takes a touch to the endline and wins a corner.

timelineItems.name: Steve Katz
timelineItems.text: SJ's getting a little heavy with their challenges #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Penalty San Jose Earthquakes. Clarence Goodson draws a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PK FOUL: Scott Caldwell's late challenge in the box gives up a PK

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 2, San Jose Earthquakes 1. Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes) converts the penalty with a right footed shot.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Chris Wondolowski cuts the Revs lead in half

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  San Jose Earthquakes. Conceded by Juan Agudelo.
Penalty conceded by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty San Jose Earthquakes. Clarence Goodson draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Penalty to San Jose. Caldwell deemed to have clipped Goodson. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: GOAL - Wondolowski buries the penalty and it's 2-1 to the #NERevs.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: Yes it is, Penalty! Caldwell clipped him inside the area, Rivera makes the call and Wondo tucks it into the lower corner. #NERevs #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Innocent Emeghara (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Wondo with maybe his first touch of the game and #Quakes74 are right back in the game after the penalty #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Shaun Francis (San Jose Earthquakes).
Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: That was a tough PK to give #NERevs #Quakes74 #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Mike Jackson
timelineItems.text: No arguements from the commentary team but that was a soft penalty award for me #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) header from very close range is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Juan Agudelo.
Foul by Adam Jahn (San Jose Earthquakes).
José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: MLS Chicano
timelineItems.text: Wondo now just a few goals away from hitting the 100 mark for his career total in the MLS. #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - @SJEarthquakes scored just 2 penalty goals in @MLS 2014, only Montreal scored fewer (0). Jump-start. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: John Mansor
timelineItems.text: How does San Jose not have a shirt sponsor? Basically in Silicon Valley. Google? Apple? Facebook? #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Cordell Cato.

timelineItems.name: James Downing
timelineItems.text: Nguyen dancing a lot in vain this season. Too many touches. One of the knocks on him in his pre-Rev days. #NERevs #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: William Olson
timelineItems.text: Wondo gives us hope, after Goodson came forward to win a penalty, now to smash-and-grab an equalizer! #NEvSJ #goQuakes

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Shaun Francis (San Jose Earthquakes).
Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: JD McCall
timelineItems.text: No other forward in @MLS tracks back and helps as much as @ChrisWondo #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #NEvSJ #NERevs Who was the last coach to CHOOSE to use all three subs by the 55th minute in an MLS game? Anybody?

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: Wondolowski doesn’t get much credit for his work on the defensive side. Plays both sides of the field. #Quakes74 #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Alisa Harris
timelineItems.text: Fans. (In reality I kind of only came out of the club section to instagram this.) #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Kelyn Rowe.

timelineItems.name: dzp
timelineItems.text: #gooooooaaal ...first @NERevolution match of the year. Stop #1 for #gregs30thbdayadventure... #gorevs #NEvSJ #revs @mls #mls #futbol #soccer #atleastitsnotsnowing #uhhhh

timelineItems.name: Lauren Hill
timelineItems.text: Keep the tradition going! @katiemc87 #NERevs ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: 10,668 on hand at Gillette today in the snow. Brave group of people #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  San Jose Earthquakes. Conceded by Chris Tierney.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: There's no way the Quakes have only 3 blocked shots today, I'd have taken the over, seems like #NERevs had so many chances blocked today.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Adam Jahn (San Jose Earthquakes).
Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Dan
timelineItems.text: All in favor of @SalinasSJ11 being our starting right wing? #NEvSJ #Quakes74 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Osbaldo Lucero
timelineItems.text: Either New Englanders are not used to cold or not very interested in soccer. Either way the turnout is dismal. #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Using a target forward to break a high press does not necessarily mean "boot it long!" Clinic from SJ here: http://t.co/rg87f3idJY

timelineItems.name: Sean Fahey
timelineItems.text: There are 3 supporter groups currently and 1 of them clearly needs to learn how to keep time in a chant. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: May be safe to say that Salinas has earn a starting spot for next week. #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Clarence Goodson.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Dubois
timelineItems.text: Cold raw Gillette stadium Saturdays ... its Super Liga weather#nerevs

timelineItems.name: Zephyr Basine
timelineItems.text: Club's full inside, not a soul outside. #NERevs #goawaysnow #gameday

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: First group of Revs players out warming up #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kyle J. Silva
timelineItems.text: Field pass for the snowy #NERevs match today.

timelineItems.name: Kyle J. Silva
timelineItems.text: Putting down the yellow stripes for the snow. #NERevs #Quakes74 #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Ted Ramey
timelineItems.text: Futbol & snow flurries! Your @SJEarthquakes take on @NERevolution at noon on @1590KLIV #Quakes74 #MLS http://t.co/gr4HWNSr6p

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Bingham just got knocked out it appeared. Glad to see he is up, very scary moment #NERevs #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Cordell Cato.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: The backline with the yellow ball. http://t.co/eZwp0QNXnm

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: Moments away from kickoff. Can the Quakes make it 3 wins in a row? #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: 20 mins to kickoff and except for the Fort, its a very sparse crowd inside Gillette #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Rowena Kim
timelineItems.text: Love playing a Southern California team in the snow. #NERevs http://t.co/T3l4N8V189

timelineItems.name: Amanda Kelvey
timelineItems.text: Through sunshine, rain, or snow! Cuz we support New England! #NERevs http://t.co/H7MLNF5iJq

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: #NERevs @WeareNewEngland Hero of the Match: #OurFriendClyde, @ClydeSimms19. Stop by @nkf table behind Section 102. http://t.co/k8evwmNq26

timelineItems.name: Midnight Riders
timelineItems.text: Warming up the crowd #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Matt Fedorka
timelineItems.text: #CenterCircleChallenge snow edition #NERevs http://t.co/xgzfS0NKsK

timelineItems.name: Gabriel Sotelo
timelineItems.text: @SJEarthquakes se enfrentan al @NERevolution en la nieve! #Quakes van por su tercera victoria de la temporada. http://t.co/gR4B02rI85

timelineItems.name: LOBINA
timelineItems.text: #LOBINA hangin' out with other bars: today @PyramidBrew in Walnut Creek. So with #Quakes74 fans in spirit(s)! #COYQ http://t.co/4WCJsqkn8d

timelineItems.name: Prairie Rose Clayton
timelineItems.text: MEANWHILE IN SECTION 112 #NERevs #nerevsgame @NERevolution @GilletteStadium http://t.co/ag3mSPZtCH

timelineItems.name: John S II
timelineItems.text: Go Revs!!! Go spring snow!!! #NERevs #nerevsgame

timelineItems.name: Midnight Riders
timelineItems.text: We love ya #nerevs - #3points

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Carl's key to the match: #NERevs need to score to win today

timelineItems.name: Julian Cardillo
timelineItems.text: The #NERevs are unbeaten in snow since 2005 (at least). #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Geoff Lepper
timelineItems.text: The words "concussion protocol" keep appearing in my mind...

timelineItems.name: Ryland
timelineItems.text: Bingham got his bell rung pretty bad there, wonder when the #MLS is going to start taking a hard line on traumatic brain injury #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: The Nitz
timelineItems.text: Not sure Bingham should be left in after that #NEvSJ

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Scott Caldwell tries a through ball, but Charlie Davies is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Squizzato
timelineItems.text: Bingham was knocked out cold. He should not continue in this game. But we all know he will. #NEvSJ

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Victor Bernardez (San Jose Earthquakes) header from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Victor Bernardez's header is tipped above the crossbar

timelineItems.name: Pitch Invaders
timelineItems.text: GAMETIME! PREDICTIONS #GO #NERevs http://t.co/tpczOsmkS0

timelineItems.name: Krissy Ayers
timelineItems.text: Ready to go! #nerevs #fortrules #netid http://t.co/C3u0m1Ki3Y

timelineItems.name: TalkQuakes
timelineItems.text: The Revolution will Not be started today ... next week maybe.. but Not today. Go #Quakes74 Beat the Revolution

timelineItems.name: MSP
timelineItems.text: Here's hoping the precipitation throws off the Californians #NERevs

timelineItems.name: James Downing
timelineItems.text: Great to see Davies get the start. Can only help to start your most proven striker. #NEvSJ #NERevs

timelineItems.name: pereira4785
timelineItems.text: Looks like it's a weak turnout for today's revs game, not surprising with today's snow and wind #NERevs

timelineItems.name: pereira4785
timelineItems.text: @MidnightRiders you guys a brave and hardcore👏👏 #nerevs http://t.co/hKxFiRmS9C

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Three keys for todays #NERevs game today. 1. Will defense be solid with JoGo back? 2. Will team play with width? Can they score?

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Davies told me Wednesday he expected when #NERevs signed Agudelo that they would play in same lineup. Today they start together for 1st time

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Have to be under 5k fans inside Gillette at kickoff #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Adam Jahn (San Jose Earthquakes) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Clarence Goodson with a headed pass.
Corner,  San Jose Earthquakes. Conceded by Andrew Farrell.
Attempt saved. Víctor Bernárdez (San Jose Earthquakes) header from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Matías Pérez García with a cross.
Corner,  San Jose Earthquakes. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.name: Mad Bora
timelineItems.text: Medical staff used concussion protocol! Protocol was ineffective! #NEvSJ

timelineItems.name: Sterling McGarvey
timelineItems.text: I hope @MLS is watching #NEvSJ right now and considering concussion protocols. Bingham got KOed there.

timelineItems.comment: Víctor Bernárdez (San Jose Earthquakes) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Eli Stuart
timelineItems.text: Does Goonie Time start earlier on the East Coast in the cold? #NeverSayDie

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Tough for to willingly go to 10 men in 1-goal game after Bingham injury, but Kinnear misses chance to take a stand on concussions #Quakes74

timelineItems.name: étienne rädler
timelineItems.text: Case in point: #Quakes74 have looked much better with Jahn on the pitch working with Wondo, Salinas and Innocent

timelineItems.comment: Sean Okoli (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jean-Baptiste Pierazzi (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: Ron Barnett
timelineItems.text: #SJEarthquakes still missing the hell out of Steven Beitashour. Amazing they haven't filled that hole since they let him walk as a FA

timelineItems.name: Robert Jonas
timelineItems.text: Lose by one or lose by two, it doesn't matter. Good to see the #SJEarthquakes going for it at end of match, looking for an equalizer. NEvSJ

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Daigo Kobayashi's shot is wide from a tough angle

timelineItems.name: ben snowfley
timelineItems.text: Stadium is apparently empty but the Fort sounds pretty good on TV. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Adam Jahn (San Jose Earthquakes).

timelineItems.name: Will Northrup
timelineItems.text: Revs are limping toward their first win. They have definitely been a different team this half. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 90' Minimum of three added minutes. #NERevs #Quakes74 #MLS

timelineItems.name: ben snowfley
timelineItems.text: The Fort is LOUD in the closing minutes. Love it. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jackie Anderson
timelineItems.text: Connecticut needs to be kicked out of New England. Couldn't find a bar in Stamford to show the #NERevs (including one advertising the game).

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Kobayashi leading all players with 95% passing accuracy thus far. #NERevs #NEvSJ #Quakes74

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Clarence Goodson.

timelineItems.name: Jimmy M Lizarde
timelineItems.text: Great 2nd half effort by #SJEarthquakes. Now need to have that for 90 minutes. #Quakes74

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth comes up big in the final seconds

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Chris Wondolowski.
Attempt saved. Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Adam Jahn.
Corner,  San Jose Earthquakes. Conceded by Darrius Barnes.

Attempt missed. Chris Wondolowski (San Jose Earthquakes) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Matías Pérez García with a cross following a corner.
Attempt missed. Jean-Baptiste Pierazzi (San Jose Earthquakes) right footed shot from very close range is too high. Assisted by Chris Wondolowski following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Brian Little
timelineItems.text: KING SHUTTLEWORTH IS HIS NAME SAVING THE GAME IS HIS ART! #NEREVS #DEMREVS

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New England Revolution 2, San Jose Earthquakes 1.
